headline: Leadership Change at American Tower (AMT): What Does It Mean for Investor Confidence Amid Ongoing Risks?
summary: On November 5, 2025, American Tower Corporation announced that Robert J. Meyer intends to retire as Senior Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer, remaining in his position until a successor is appointed and assisting in the transition until his retirement before the end of 2026. This leadership transition comes as the company navigates investor concern over delayed U.S. billings and potential customer churn following the EchoStar spectrum divestiture. We’ll explore how these...
